newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Soybean values rise, wheat steady.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Soybean values rise, wheat steady.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf soybean basis offers rose two cents per bushel for all positions in reaction to lower CBOT soybean futures and strong competition from soybean processors, grain dealers said.
CIF basis offers for June shipment also rose late Friday to 29 cents over CBOT July from 26 over early Friday.

Winter wheat basis values were unchanged despite Egypt announcing a new tender for 165,000 tonnes of U.S. hard red winter wheat or Australian hard red wheat. The wheat is for last-half June to July shipment.
Corn basis values were unchanged.
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
June unq + N nc +23 + N unc
July unq + N nc +24 + N unc
Aug 1-20 unq + U nc +37 + U unc
Aug 12-31 unq + U nc +35.5 + U unc
Sept 1-20 unq + U nc +37 + U unc
Sept 11-30 unq + U nc +32 + U unc
Note: N=CBOT July, U=CBOT Sept, nc=no comparison.
SOYBEANS (No. 2 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu)
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
June 1-20 unq + N nc +28 + N up 2
June 11-30 unq + N nc +30 + N up 2
July 1-20 unq + N nc +30 + N up 2
July 12-31 unq + N nc +32 + N up 2
August unq + N nc +62 + Q up 2
Note: N=CBOT July, Q=CBOT August, nc=no comparison
SRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
May unq nc +40 + N unc
June +12 + N nc +14 + N unc
July +12 + N nc +14 + N unc
August unq nc +15 + U unc
HRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis KCBT, cts/bu) -
May unq nc +60 + N unc
June unq nc +45 + N unc
July unq nc +41 + N unc
August unq nc +41 + U unc
Note: N=July futures, U=September futures.
((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
